code: import{connect}from"react-redux";import{increment,decrement,reset}from"../store/action";import Max from"./Max";import Steps from"./Steps";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Counter(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:props.value}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Steps,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Max,{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"increment",onClick:props.value+props.step<=props.max?function(){return props.dispatch(increment());}:function(){return null;},children:"+ Increment"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"decrement",onClick:function onClick(){return props.dispatch(decrement());},children:"- Decrement"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"reset",onClick:function onClick(){return props.dispatch(reset());},children:"Reset"})]})]});}function mapStateToProps(state){return{value:state.value,max:state.max,step:state.step};}export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Counter);
